channel.title: Ever heard Van Halen's Right Now?
channel.description:
Ever heard Van Halen's Right Now?
I was just listening to music on the computer and I came across a song I haven't heard yet. This song has been on my comp for a while and when I played it today, I thought it was great. It's a great 5 minute long rock song that I hope you will enjoy. I looked it up and according to Wikipedia, it won several awards from MTV and it came out surprisingly in the 90s.
Here are the lyrics. http://www.lyricsfreak.com/v/van+halen/right+now_20142896.html
And if you want to hear the song, search for [b]Right Now[/b] on [url=http://www.dizzler.com]Dizzler.com[/url]. Enjoy! :)
~Ron
